hero.subtext: At Sammy's House of Coffee, we only brew the freshest coffee from all around the world. We also serve pastries such as cupcakes and brownies.

about.subtext: Welcome to our house of coffee! We hope you enjoy our broad selection of premium coffee from all over the world. Welcome to our house of coffee! members.name: Sammy
members.quote: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts.
